Node.definition: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process of making a hole in the ground or a wall; + usually with the help of a digging tool; ► in order to be able to gain access to the location behind it; agent: human
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage
= object taken without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= action by which someone causes something else to be harmed or destroyed by fire

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

Node.gloss: to release|to let go|to let loose|to set free
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans allow (other) humans or animals to move away freely from a place where they have been confined

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
collective: = animals that have been domesticated
= process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= a pile of bundles of harvested ears of grain
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= grain as it is growing on the field and awaiting harvesting; it burns easily; people can pluck the ears and eat the grains
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
action by which someone produces fire

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which a fire is burning with a harmful and destructive effect
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth|= people with the duty of judging people's cases; ≈ perhaps seen as representatives of God on earth

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (on something); hence: = action by which humans take possession of objects belonging to someone else
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping
= object that is not located in the place where it is expected to be
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth|= people with the duty of judging people's cases; ≈ perhaps seen as representatives of God on earth
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to declare guilty|to condemn as guilty

= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness
= an object that functions as evidence or proof that something has taken place or that some decision has been made
literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= state in which animals or objects have been made available to be of service or use to others for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a fixed regular payment for work, either with money or in kind; ≈ by extension: all that happens in return for one's actions

Node.gloss: to lure|to allure|to entice|to coax|to persuade|to seduce|to flatter|to trick|to deceive
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities provoke in (other) humans the will or desire to do something
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a man makes a marriage contract by means of the payment of a bride price with the family of a woman, which is usually done before the man takes the woman to live with him

Node.gloss: to lie with > to sleep with|to have sex with
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with or next to someone; hence: = action by which humans have sexual relations with other humans or animals

Node.gloss: to acquire as wife|to marry by paying a bride price
Node.definition: = action by which a man makes a woman his wife by paying the bride price

Node.gloss: to acquire as wife|to marry by paying a bride price
Node.definition: = action by which a man makes a woman his wife by paying the bride price
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a payment made to the family of the bride by the groom
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
= a person who has made it their profession to help humans gain control over (other) humans, animals, or deities ◄ through rituals and incantations

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to lie with > to sleep with|to have sex with
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with or next to someone; hence: = action by which humans have sexual relations with other humans or animals
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= causative actions by which humans set someone or something irrevocably apart for a deity, ► as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of that deity
= particle marking a constituent or part of a constituent as the only condition for the entire proposition to be true
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
literally: to bow down; hence: = causative action in which a humans or deities cause (other) humans to suffer hardship and trouble, ► resulting in a state of inability to help oneself
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to bow down; hence: = causative action in which a humans or deities cause (other) humans to suffer hardship and trouble, ► resulting in a state of inability to help oneself
literally: to bow down; hence: = causative action in which a humans or deities cause (other) humans to suffer hardship and trouble, ► resulting in a state of inability to help oneself

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which the anger (אַף) of humans and deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= to give money or other valuables to someone else, which can be used for some time but is to be returned later, whether with interest or not; ≈ often associated with wealth and acts of charity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned

Node.gloss: to place (responsibility on someone) > to lay upon|to bring upon|to impose upon|to charge with|to commit to
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future
= the amount of money a person is required to pay for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
literally: covering; hence: the clothing that are needed for protection against the cold and enable people to function within their community
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping
= the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= state in which deities are favorably disposed to someone, or of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people, and acting accordingly
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so
= the entirety of a person's harvest
= liquid ◄ extracted from fruit or vegetables
= to keep something to oneself, refusing to give it to someone else
= first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a pig (חֲזִיר) associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
